flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Have you ever used an ipod, and like me, you feel like you will lose your eardrums, but still love music just as much? Well, the volume cable will let you tune your own volume, outside of the volume for an ipod, stereo, radio, or whatever.
guide.introduction_rendered: Have you ever used an ipod, and like me, you feel like you will lose your eardrums, but still love music just as much? Well, the volume cable will let you tune your own volume, outside of the volume for an ipod, stereo, radio, or whatever.

lines.text: For long range audio, use a higher ohm potentiometer.
lines.text_raw: For long range audio, use a higher ohm potentiometer.

guide.summary: Don't bust your drums with this cheap, simple hack.
